document.full_text: new jersey gov. chris christie came under fire on wednesday for using a state police helicopter to attend his son's baseball game, but authorities said his travel came at no extra cost to taxpayers.
document.title: new jersey cops defend christie's chopper trip to son's school
lines_and_colors: new jersey gov. chris christie came under fire on wednesday for using a state police helicopter to attend his son's baseball game, but authorities said his travel came at no extra cost to taxpayers.
